flawed_nl_solution:
There were 12.6 - 4.6 = <<12.6-4.6=7>>7 gigabytes used after deleting some files.
Then, the used space went up to 7 + 2 = <<7+2=9>>9 gigabytes after storing other files.
Thus, the new 20 gigabytes external drive will have 20 - 9 = <<20-9=11>>11 gigabytes free.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
